Thursday 18 May 2017 (morning)

Option B — Oceans and their coastal margins

4.   The map shows some of the threats to the Great Barrier Reef, Queensland, Australia.



                                                                     Key:


                                                                                  Coral reef


                                                                                  World Heritage area



                                                                     Threats to the Great Barrier Reef:

                                                                                  Mega port
                                                                                  Mining
                                                                                  Shipping superhighway



                                Cairns




                                Townsville




                                                    Mackay


                   N                                   Rockhampton

                                                             Gladstone
                                                                  Bundaberg




          Scale:
          0            250 km     500 km       750 km        1000 km         Brisbane


                                           [Source: www.fightforthereef.org.au]

Option F — The geography of food and health

11.   The map shows the life expectancy at birth for countries other than those in the Americas.


        N




                                                                                                                 Equator


      Key:
      Life expectancy at birth
      (years)
          < 50
          50 – 59
          60 – 69
          70 – 79
          80 – 86


                                       [Source: Reprinted from WHO: Life Expectancy,
               http://www.who.int/gho/mortality_burden_disease/life_tables/situation_trends/en, accessed 2015]

Option F — The geography of food and health

12.       Map A shows part of the urban area of Nashville, US. The scale of the map is 1:24 000 and the contour inter
          Map B shows the distribution of obesity, a form of malnutrition, for different areas of Nashville.

Option G — Urban environments

13.   The map shows the distribution of the neighbourhoods in an African city with low incomes and high
      population density.


                         N




                                                                                City centre




                                                              Scale:
                                                              0                      20 km

                         Key:
                             Areas of high density and low income


                      [Source: Adapted from P Guinness, Johannesburg – a city of acute disparity,
            Topic Eye A-Level Geography 2014–2015 edition, page 11, published by Cross Academe Limited.]
